text: The 1923–24 international cricket season was from September 1923 to April 1924. The season consists with one minor international tour. ==Season overview== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="7" |International tours |- ! rowspan="2" |Start date ! rowspan="2" |Home team ! rowspan="2" |Away team ! colspan="4" |Results [Matches] |- !Test !ODI !FC !LA |- | | | |; style="text- align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |0–2 [2] |; style="text- align:center"| — |} ==February== === New South Wales in New Zealand === {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan="9"|First-class series |- ! Result |- | Match 1 || 29 Feb–3 March || Sydney Smith || Charlie Macartney || Jade Stadium, Christchurch || by 8 wickets |- | Match 2 || 7–8 March || Sydney Smith || Charlie Macartney || Basin Reserve, Wellington || by an innings and 126 runs |} ==References== Category:International cricket competitions by season Category:1923 in cricket Category:1924 in cricket
title: International cricket in 1923–24
